item.title: Home - Hermes Astrology

item.description: Understanding Pluto's role as the planet of death, rebirth, and transformation in astrological interpretations

item.description: Explore how Pluto's transformative energy manifests through each of the twelve zodiac signs

item.description: Discover how Pluto influences different areas of life through its placement in the astrological houses

item.description: Pluto's revolutionary energy in Aquarius - transforming society, technology, and collective consciousness

item.title: Pluto in Capricorn - Structural Revolution
item.description: Pluto's transformative power in Capricorn - reshaping institutions, governments, and societal structures

item.title: Pluto in Sagittarius - Philosophical Depth
item.description: Pluto's journey through Sagittarius - transforming beliefs, expanding consciousness, and seeking truth

item.title: Pluto in Scorpio - Intense Regeneration
item.description: Pluto's powerful presence in its home sign of Scorpio - deep psychological transformation and rebirth

item.title: Pluto in Libra - Relationship Evolution
item.description: Pluto's balancing act in Libra - transforming relationships, partnerships, and social harmony

item.title: Pluto in Virgo - Analytical Purification
item.description: Pluto's analytical transformation in Virgo - purifying health, work, and service to others
